description: A program finding the local extrema in a dataset.

input.title: Input File
input.description: Input dataset in which Extrema are to be identified.

hood.title: Neighborhood Radius
hood.description: Neighborhood radius (R) in mm. Default is 8 mm.

thresh.title: Threshold
thresh.description: Do not consider nodes with value less than this threshold. Default is 0.

gthresh.title: Gradient Threshold
gthresh.description: Do not consider nodes with gradient less than this threshold. Default is 0.01.

gscale.title: Gradient Scale
gscale.description: Scaling to apply to gradient computation.

extype.title: Extrema Type
extype.description: Find maxima, minima, or extrema. Options are MAX (default), MIN, ABS.

table.title: Table File
table.description: Name of file in which to store a record of the extrema found.
